body_html:
We now have MKL support and you will need to build from source. I will also be updating the performance guide. Here are the basic command, which will work starting at TF 1.2 RC2. At some point it may become the default but we are reluctant to support another TF variant.

1.       Configure tensorflow
./configure
MKL -> yes
everything else -> default

2.       Build
bazel build --config=mkl --copt="-DEIGEN_USE_VML" -c opt //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

This will provide a signifiant boost and Intel is actively working on improving edge cases as they are found.

Is KNL available on AWS? I would like to use it can you provide a link.
